Sequence Information.Peptide Name: DAN2 (likely natural AMPs; cecropin-like, UCLL1, insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (81.58%) toDAN1Mol formula: C188H318N55O46; Mol Wt: 4083.906; Mol Ex Coeff: 7040; GRAVY: -0.213.Activity:  active against E. coli (MIC 2.1 ug/ml), S.aureus (MIC>100 ug/ml), B. subtilis (MIC 50 uM), C. albicans (MIC 72.5 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (MIC 5 ug/ml), and K. pneumoniae (MIC 4.3 ug/ml).Toxicity:  non-hemo.lytic till 200 ug/ml.
Literature Information.Author: Duwadi D, Shrestha A, Yilma B, Kozlovski I, Sa-Eed M, Dahal N, Jukosky J.2018
Literature Information.Title: Identification and screening of potent antimicrobial peptides in arthropod genomes.
